mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.email, u.profile_picture, ph.payment_id, ph.payment_code, ph.balance, ph.payment_date FROM payment_history ph LEFT JOIN user u ON ph.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY ph.payment_date desc
SELECT DATE(ph.payment_date) AS payment_day, SUM(ph.balance) AS total_balance FROM payment_history ph GROUP BY payment_day;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_history (payment_id, payment_code, balance, payment_date, user_id) VALUES (#{paymentId}, #{paymentCode}, #{balance}, #{paymentDate}, #{userId});
